articles.author: Vladimir Hedrih
articles.title: ADHD is somewhat heritable, study finds - PsyPost
articles.description: A study reveals ADHD behaviors are heritable, with minor influence from parental behaviors or gene-environment interactions. Analyzing twins and families, it found genetic factors largely explain parent-child ADHD resemblance.
articles.content: A study of a massive number of twins revealed that behaviors indicative of attention deficit-hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) exhibit a notable degree of heritability. This suggests that the resemblance… [+4557 chars]
